sections.background: Eliminate the data attributes that cannot describe the key characteristics of the system, and only retain part of the data attribute set that can describe the key characteristics.

metadata.concept_definition: Eliminate the data attributes that cannot describe the key characteristics of the system, and only retain part of the data attribute set that can describe the key characteristics.
